summary: This is an 'Appearance of Counsel' filing from the United States District Court for the District of New Hampshire, in which attorney Lawrence A. Vogelman formally enters his appearance as counsel for defendant Ghislaine Maxwell in criminal case 20-cr-330.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in criminal case 20-cr-330, for whom Lawrence A. Vogelman is entering an appearance as counsel.

persons.name: Lawrence A. Vogelman
persons.context: Attorney who is filing this appearance to represent Ghislaine Maxwell in the United States District Court for the District of New Hampshire.

connections.description: Vogelman formally appears as legal counsel for defendant Ghislaine Maxwell in her criminal case.

events.title: Attorney Appearance Filed
events.description: Lawrence A. Vogelman files an 'Appearance of Counsel' document with the United States District Court for the District of New Hampshire, formally entering his representation of Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: United States District Court for the District of New Hampshire
keyFacts: Attorney Lawrence A. Vogelman formally entered his appearance as counsel for Ghislaine Maxwell on July 6, 2020.
The filing is related to criminal case number 20-cr-330 in the United States District Court for the District of New Hampshire.
The document is a standard legal form (USDCNH-96) used for an attorney to notify the court and parties of representation.
